name: Blocky Traffic Attack
description:
Blocky traffic attack

Get ready to save Banana Man.
That’s right! Blocky Traffic Attack is a single touch game where you have to save our character Banana Man from the heavy traffic on the road. This game features exciting voxel graphics.
This traffic game is an endless game based on the score you achieve by saving Banana Man as long as you can. It’s not a racing game rather a fun traffic vs Banana Man attack at road arena. You must be dedicated and loyal towards the Banana Man to save him because as you proceed it will get challenging.

Features:
Extreme road attack on Banana Man
 Challenging Traffic
